name: Alice Escape (exelppp)
description:
This game is called Alice escape, which is a game with both randomness and strategy. The player has three dice in his hand, each of which has six different functions, and so does the enemy. This game is still under development. At present, there are three levels in total. Can you help the little girl escape? 

Developer 

Art: Jessie, Lam

Client: AfterTea_Time 

And special thanks to Pussycat
